const OverlayKey &  rhs 
) const [inline, virtual]

indicates which of the two given keys is closer to the relative key

Parameters:
lhs first key
rhs second key
Returns:
-1 if lhs is closer, 0 if lhs and rhs are equal and 1 if rhs closer to the relative key
